reward-npc-visit: üéÅ Visit the reward NPC to claim your rewards!

first_steps.name: First Steps
first_steps.info: Learn the basics of RPG gameplay

dialogs.0: Welcome to SypixelRPG! I'll help you get started on your adventure.
dialogs.1: First, you should visit the Hub area to get familiar with the world.
dialogs.2: After that, find the Village Merchant to learn about trading. Good luck!

first_steps.accept: I'm ready to begin my adventure!

basic_combat.name: Basic Combat

dialogs.0: Time to learn how to fight!
dialogs.1: Equip a weapon and find some monsters.
dialogs.2: Defeat 5 zombies to complete this quest.

basic_combat.decline: I need more time to prepare...

mining.name: Daily Mining
mining.info: Mine valuable ores for the village

dialogs.0: We need iron for our blacksmith!
dialogs.1: Please mine 20 iron ore blocks.
dialogs.2: You can find them in the caves nearby.
dialogs.3: Be careful of the monsters down there!

hunting.name: Monster Hunter
hunting.info: Hunt dangerous monsters threatening the village

dialogs.0: Monsters are terrorizing our village!
dialogs.1: Please help us eliminate them.
dialogs.2: We'll reward you handsomely.

gathering.name: Resource Gathering
gathering.info: Gather essential resources for the village

dialogs.0: We need various resources for the village.
dialogs.1: Can you gather some wood and stone?
dialogs.2: 20 oak logs should be enough.
dialogs.3: And about 30 cobblestone blocks.
dialogs.4: You can find trees in the forest.

fishing.name: Daily Fishing
fishing.info: Catch fresh fish for the village market

dialogs.0: The village needs fresh fish!
dialogs.1: Can you catch 10 fish for us?
dialogs.2: Any type of fish will do.
dialogs.3: You can find the best fishing spots near the lake.

exploration.name: Daily Exploration
exploration.info: Explore new areas and report findings

dialogs.0: We need someone to explore the uncharted territories.
dialogs.1: There might be valuable resources or hidden dangers.
dialogs.2: Scout the area and report back to me.
dialogs.3: Be careful out there, adventurer.
dialogs.4: Mark any points of interest on this map.
dialogs.5: Your exploration helps keep our village safe.
dialogs.6: We'll reward you for any discoveries.
dialogs.8: Are you ready to venture into the unknown?
dialogs.9: Your courage will be well compensated.

dialogs.0: I have important packages that need delivery.
dialogs.1: Can you help me deliver them to the right people?
dialogs.2: Each package is labeled with the recipient's name.
dialogs.3: Make sure they arrive safely and on time.
dialogs.4: Some deliveries might be urgent.
dialogs.5: You'll be our official courier for today.
dialogs.6: The recipients are expecting these packages.

crafting.name: Daily Crafting
crafting.info: Craft items for the village needs

dialogs.0: We need someone skilled in crafting.
dialogs.1: Can you help us create some essential items?
dialogs.2: We need tools, weapons, and armor.
dialogs.3: The materials are ready, we just need your expertise.
dialogs.4: Quality craftsmanship is always appreciated.
dialogs.5: Your creations will help the entire village.
dialogs.6: We'll provide the recipes if you need them.
dialogs.7: Time to put your crafting skills to use!

dialogs.0: There are dangerous criminals on the loose.
dialogs.1: We need someone brave enough to hunt them down.
dialogs.2: Each target has a bounty on their head.
dialogs.3: Bring them to justice, dead or alive.
dialogs.4: These criminals are extremely dangerous.
dialogs.5: You'll need skill and cunning to catch them.
dialogs.6: The kingdom will reward you handsomely.
dialogs.7: Check the wanted posters for details.
dialogs.8: Are you ready to become a bounty hunter?
dialogs.10: Good luck, and stay safe out there.

dialogs.0: The ancient guardian has been sleeping for centuries.
dialogs.1: Dark forces are gathering in the realm.
dialogs.2: We need the guardian's power to protect us.
dialogs.3: You must gather the three awakening stones.
dialogs.4: Each stone is hidden in a dangerous dungeon.
dialogs.5: The Fire Stone lies in the Volcanic Depths.
dialogs.6: The Ice Stone rests in the Frozen Peaks.
dialogs.7: The Thunder Stone awaits in the Sky Fortress.

dialogs.0: You have been chosen by destiny.
dialogs.1: A great evil threatens our world.
dialogs.2: Only a true hero can save us.
dialogs.3: Your journey will be long and difficult.

path_of_darkness.name: Path of Darkness

dialogs.0: The light has failed us.
dialogs.1: Only through darkness can we find true power.
dialogs.2: Will you join us?

path_of_darkness.decline: I will stay in the light...

dialogs.0: The light shall guide your way.
dialogs.1: Stay true to justice and honor.
dialogs.2: Will you be our champion?

dialogs.0: Enemy forces are at our gates!
dialogs.1: We need every able warrior.
dialogs.2: Will you stand with us?

dialogs.0: A portal to another dimension has opened!
dialogs.1: Monsters are pouring through.
dialogs.2: We must close it before it's too late.
dialogs.3: You'll need the Portal Key to seal it.

dialogs.0: The void is consuming our world!
dialogs.1: Dark creatures emerge from the shadows.
dialogs.2: We must push them back.
dialogs.3: Are you brave enough to enter the void?

dialogs.0: The time has come for the final confrontation.
dialogs.1: All our hopes rest on you.
dialogs.2: The Dark Lord awaits in his fortress.
dialogs.3: This battle will decide the fate of the world.
dialogs.4: Are you ready, hero?

dialogs.0: Dark clouds gather on the horizon.
dialogs.1: A storm unlike any other approaches.
dialogs.2: We must prepare our defenses.
dialogs.3: Gather the storm crystals to protect the city.

dialogs.0: This is it - our last chance.
dialogs.1: The enemy surrounds us.
dialogs.2: We fight here or we fall.
dialogs.3: Will you stand with us?
dialogs.4: For honor and glory!

dialogs.0: The war is over at last.
dialogs.1: A new era of peace begins.
dialogs.2: But we must remain vigilant.
dialogs.3: Help us rebuild what was lost.
dialogs.4: Together, we'll create a better world.

dialogs.0: Many heroes have fallen in this war.
dialogs.1: Their sacrifice must not be forgotten.
dialogs.2: We must honor their memory.
dialogs.3: Gather the memorial stones.
dialogs.4: Place them at the Heroes' Monument.

dialogs.0: The realm needs an eternal guardian.
dialogs.1: One who will watch over it forever.
dialogs.2: This is a great responsibility.
dialogs.3: You will gain immense power.
dialogs.4: But you must sacrifice your mortality.
dialogs.5: Will you become the Eternal Guardian?

dialogs.0: The old heroes have passed.
dialogs.1: But their legacy must continue.
dialogs.2: You are the new generation.
dialogs.3: Take up their mantle.
dialogs.4: Lead us into the future.

dialogs.0: The war has left scars on the land.
dialogs.1: Nature itself needs healing.
dialogs.2: Use the Seeds of Life to restore the forests.
dialogs.3: Purify the corrupted waters.
dialogs.4: The land will bloom again.

dialogs.0: The ancient prophecy speaks of you.
dialogs.1: You are the chosen one who will save our world.
dialogs.2: But first, you must gather the Sacred Artifacts.
dialogs.3: Only then can you face the coming darkness.

chosen_one.name: The Chosen One
chosen_one.info: Embrace your destiny as the chosen hero

dialogs.0: You are the one we've been waiting for.
dialogs.1: The signs are clear - you are the Chosen One.
dialogs.2: Great power lies dormant within you.
dialogs.3: We must awaken it before it's too late.
dialogs.4: The fate of all realms rests in your hands.

dialogs.0: The Elemental Stones hold immense power.
dialogs.1: Fire, Water, Earth, and Air - each guards its stone jealously.
dialogs.2: You must convince or defeat the Elemental Guardians.
dialogs.3: The Fire Stone burns in the Volcanic Heart.
dialogs.4: The Water Stone rests in the Ocean's Depths.
dialogs.5: The Earth Stone lies buried in the Mountain's Core.
dialogs.6: The Air Stone floats in the Sky Temple.
dialogs.7: Gather them all to unlock ultimate power!

dialogs.0: Every hero must face their first trial.
dialogs.1: This test will determine your true potential.
dialogs.2: You must enter the Trial Chamber alone.
dialogs.3: Face your fears and overcome them.
dialogs.4: Many have tried, few have succeeded.
dialogs.5: Your courage will be tested to its limits.

lost_kingdom.name: The Lost Kingdom
lost_kingdom.info: Discover the fate of the lost kingdom

dialogs.0: Long ago, a great kingdom vanished overnight.
dialogs.1: No one knows what happened to it.
dialogs.2: But I've found clues to its location!
dialogs.3: Will you help me uncover the truth?
dialogs.4: The lost kingdom's treasures await!

dialogs.0: Shadow creatures are invading our realm!
dialogs.1: They emerge from dark portals at night.
dialogs.2: We must close these portals before it's too late.
dialogs.3: Will you help us fight back the darkness?

dialogs.0: Dark magic has corrupted vast territories.
dialogs.1: The land itself has turned evil.
dialogs.2: Plants wither, animals become monsters.
dialogs.3: We need someone to purify these lands.
dialogs.4: It's dangerous work, but necessary.

ancient_evil.name: Ancient Evil
ancient_evil.info: Prevent the awakening of an ancient evil

dialogs.0: An ancient evil stirs in its prison.
dialogs.1: The seals that bind it are weakening.
dialogs.2: If it breaks free, all will be lost.
dialogs.3: We must strengthen the seals!
dialogs.4: Time is running out!

heroes_alliance.name: Heroes Alliance
heroes_alliance.info: Form an alliance of legendary heroes

dialogs.0: The threat is too great for one hero alone.
dialogs.1: We must form an alliance of champions.
dialogs.2: Seek out the greatest warriors of each land.
dialogs.3: Convince them to join our cause.
dialogs.4: Together, we can save the world!

dialogs.0: The Ancient Dragon sleeps beneath the mountain.
dialogs.1: It has slumbered for a thousand years.
dialogs.2: But we need its power to face the coming threat.
dialogs.3: The Dragon Awakening Ritual is dangerous.
dialogs.4: You'll need the Dragon Horn to wake it.
dialogs.5: And the Dragon's Trust to gain its aid.
dialogs.6: The dragon may attack if awakened improperly.
dialogs.7: You must speak the Ancient Dragon Language.
dialogs.9: The dragon will test your worth.
dialogs.10: Only the pure of heart can pass.
dialogs.11: Are you ready for this challenge?

dragon_trials.name: Dragon Trials
dragon_trials.info: Complete the trials of the Dragon Lords

dialogs.0: The Dragon Lords have issued a challenge.
dialogs.1: Complete their trials to earn their respect.
dialogs.2: Each trial tests a different virtue.
dialogs.3: Courage, Wisdom, Strength, and Honor.
dialogs.4: Success grants you dragon powers!

dialogs.0: The Dragon Heart is a legendary artifact.
dialogs.1: It grants its wielder dragon-like powers.
dialogs.2: But it's guarded by the Elder Dragon.
dialogs.3: You must prove yourself worthy.
dialogs.4: The heart chooses its owner.

dragon_pact.name: Dragon Pact
dragon_pact.info: Form a pact with the dragon clan

dialogs.0: The Dragon Clan offers you a pact.
dialogs.1: Serve them, and gain their power.
dialogs.2: But the pact binds you forever.
dialogs.3: You'll become part dragon yourself.
dialogs.4: Is this a price you're willing to pay?

dialogs.0: A massive fortress floats in the sky.
dialogs.1: It's the enemy's main stronghold.
dialogs.2: We must assault it to end this war.
dialogs.3: But first, we need a way to reach it.
dialogs.4: Will you lead the assault?

shadow_cult.name: Shadow Cult
shadow_cult.info: Infiltrate and destroy the shadow cult

dialogs.0: A dark cult operates in the shadows.
dialogs.1: They're planning something terrible.
dialogs.2: We need someone to infiltrate them.
dialogs.3: Learn their plans and stop them.
dialogs.4: This mission requires absolute secrecy.

dialogs.0: The cultists are performing a forbidden ritual!
dialogs.1: They're trying to summon an ancient demon!
dialogs.2: We must stop them before midnight!
dialogs.3: The ritual site is heavily guarded.
dialogs.4: Failure means the end of our world!

dialogs.0: A chaos storm approaches our realm!
dialogs.1: It warps reality itself!
dialogs.2: We need to activate the protection barriers.
dialogs.3: But someone must venture into the storm.
dialogs.4: Will you brave the chaos?

dialogs.0: The Dark Lord's fortress stands before us.
dialogs.1: Its walls are said to be impenetrable.
dialogs.2: But we've found a secret entrance.
dialogs.3: We need a hero to lead the infiltration.
dialogs.4: This could be our only chance!

dialogs.0: A rift between dimensions has opened!
dialogs.1: Strange creatures pour through!
dialogs.2: Reality itself is at risk!
dialogs.3: We must close it from both sides!
dialogs.4: Will you enter the other dimension?

dialogs.0: Psst... You look like someone who appreciates... opportunities.
dialogs.1: The Thieves Guild is always looking for talented individuals.
dialogs.2: We operate in the shadows, taking what others won't miss.
dialogs.3: Interested in joining our brotherhood?

dialogs.0: The volcanic depths hold rare minerals.
dialogs.1: But the heat and lava make it extremely dangerous.
dialogs.2: Will you brave the depths for riches?

dialogs.0: Ancient ruins have been discovered nearby.
dialogs.1: They may contain powerful artifacts.
dialogs.2: But beware - they're protected by ancient magic.

alchemist_experiment.name: The Alchemist's Experiment
alchemist_experiment.info: Help the alchemist with a dangerous experiment

dialogs.0: I need help with a delicate experiment.
dialogs.1: It could revolutionize potion-making!
dialogs.2: Though there is a small chance of explosion...

royal_messenger.name: Royal Messenger
royal_messenger.info: Deliver a secret message for the royal court

dialogs.0: I have a confidential message for the Duke.
dialogs.1: It must be delivered without anyone knowing.
dialogs.2: Can I trust you with this task?

dialogs.0: Legends speak of a city beneath the waves.
dialogs.1: It sank centuries ago with all its treasures.
dialogs.2: Do you have the courage to dive deep?

dialogs.0: I'm looking for an apprentice.
dialogs.1: The work is hard but rewarding.
dialogs.2: You'll learn to forge legendary weapons.

collect_herbs.name: Herb Collection
collect_herbs.info: Gather rare herbs for the healer

dialogs.0: I need rare herbs for my medicines.
dialogs.1: They grow in dangerous places.
dialogs.2: Will you gather them for me?

crystal_cavern.name: Crystal Cavern
crystal_cavern.info: Mine magical crystals from the cavern

dialogs.0: The crystal cavern is full of magical gems.
dialogs.1: But it's guarded by crystal golems.
dialogs.2: Are you brave enough to enter?

desert_oasis.name: Desert Oasis
desert_oasis.info: Find the hidden oasis in the desert

dialogs.0: There's a hidden oasis in the desert.
dialogs.1: It contains the Water of Life.
dialogs.2: Many have searched, few have returned.

dialogs.0: The enchanted forest is full of magic.
dialogs.1: But it's easy to get lost forever.
dialogs.2: Will you risk entering?

farmers_request.name: Farmer's Request
farmers_request.info: Help the farmer with his crops

dialogs.0: My crops are being destroyed by pests!
dialogs.1: I need someone to help protect them.
dialogs.2: Will you help save my harvest?

dialogs.0: They say a legendary fish lives in the deep lake.
dialogs.1: I've been trying to catch it for years.
dialogs.2: Maybe you'll have better luck?

dialogs.0: An ancient temple lies forgotten in the jungle.
dialogs.1: It's said to contain powerful relics.
dialogs.2: But it's also full of traps.

dialogs.0: The frozen peaks hold ancient ice crystals.
dialogs.1: But the cold is deadly.
dialogs.2: Will you brave the frozen heights?

dialogs.0: A mysterious illness has struck the village.
dialogs.1: I need special ingredients for the cure.
dialogs.2: Will you help me save them?

hidden_valley.name: Hidden Valley

dialogs.0: Legends speak of a hidden valley.
dialogs.1: It's a paradise untouched by time.
dialogs.2: Will you search for it?

hidden_valley.decline: Sounds too good to be true...

innkeeper_trouble.name: Innkeeper's Trouble
innkeeper_trouble.info: Help the innkeeper with rowdy customers

dialogs.0: Some customers have been causing trouble.
dialogs.1: They won't pay and won't leave.
dialogs.2: Can you help me deal with them?

dialogs.0: Strange things happen in the library at night.
dialogs.1: Books move on their own, whispers echo.
dialogs.2: Will you investigate?

lost_treasure.name: Lost Treasure
lost_treasure.info: Search for the pirate's lost treasure

dialogs.0: I have a map to a pirate's treasure!
dialogs.1: It's buried somewhere on the coast.
dialogs.2: Want to search for it together?

merchants_dilemma.name: Merchant's Dilemma
merchants_dilemma.info: Help the merchant recover stolen goods

dialogs.0: Bandits stole my entire shipment!
dialogs.1: I'll go bankrupt without those goods.
dialogs.2: Please help me recover them!

dialogs.0: There's been a cave-in at the mine!
dialogs.1: Several miners are trapped inside.
dialogs.2: We need someone brave to rescue them!

dialogs.0: A strange cave has appeared overnight.
dialogs.1: Weird sounds come from within.
dialogs.2: Will you investigate?

light_paladin.name: Path of the Paladin
light_paladin.info: Become a holy warrior of light

objectives.holy_water: Obtain Holy Water from the Sacred Spring
objectives.meditation: Meditate at the Temple of Light

dialogs.0: You seek the path of the Paladin, young one?
dialogs.1: A Paladin is more than a warrior - they are a beacon of hope.
dialogs.2: You must prove your devotion to the Light.
dialogs.3: Complete these sacred trials to earn your place among us.
dialogs.4: May the Light guide your way.

light_paladin.accept: I will walk the path of Light!
light_paladin.decline: I am not ready for this commitment...

warrior_advancement.name: Warrior Advancement
warrior_advancement.info: Advance your warrior class to the next level

dialogs.0: You've proven yourself as a warrior.
dialogs.1: It's time to advance to the next level.
dialogs.2: This will unlock new abilities and skills.
dialogs.3: But first, you must pass the Trial of Strength.
dialogs.4: Are you ready to become a true warrior?

dialogs.0: So you want to become a master blacksmith?
dialogs.1: It takes years of dedication and practice.
dialogs.2: You'll need to prove your skills first.
dialogs.3: Craft these items to show your worth:
dialogs.4: A Damascus Steel Sword
dialogs.6: And a pair of Enchanted Gauntlets

dialogs.0: The veil between worlds grows thin tonight!
dialogs.1: Halloween has come to our realm!
dialogs.2: Ghosts and ghouls roam the streets.
dialogs.3: Collect candy from trick-or-treating!
dialogs.4: But beware the Headless Horseman...
dialogs.5: He rides at midnight seeking heads!
dialogs.7: Visit the Haunted Mansion if you dare!
dialogs.8: Complete Halloween challenges for special rewards!
dialogs.10: The spirits are restless - be careful!
